M

Main - Class in at.ae.chat.simulation
Main class of the Chat application.
Main() - Constructor for class at.ae.chat.simulation.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class at.ae.chat.simulation.Main
Main method of the chat application.
MainFrame - Class in at.ae.chat.gui
BadWordFilter decorator for Message Objects.
MainFrame(String) - Constructor for class at.ae.chat.gui.MainFrame
All the attributes for the gui are initialized in the constructor and some elements are added to a specific JPanel.
Message - Class in at.ae.chat.message
Message class representing a Message sent over the network.
Message(String, String) - Constructor for class at.ae.chat.message.Message
Creates a new Message Object with the given message and the current Timestamp.
Message(String, String, long) - Constructor for class at.ae.chat.message.Message
Creates a new Message Object with the given text and the given Timestamp.
MessageBus - Class in at.ae.chat.message
Message notification bus, used to notify for new received messages.
messageReceived(Message) - Static method in class at.ae.chat.message.MessageBus
Notifies all registered listeners of the received message.
MessageReceiver - Interface in at.ae.chat.message
Message Listener Interface, used in the connector to notify for new messages.
MessageSender - Interface in at.ae.chat.message
Communicator interface implemented by Client and Server.
MessageTest - Class in at.ae.chat.test
Testclass, which test the BadWordFilter and the Translator.
MessageTest() - Constructor for class at.ae.chat.test.MessageTest
